original_text: But of the tree of the knowledge of good and evil, thou shalt not eat of it: for in the day that thou eatest thereof thou shalt surely die.
korean_text: 선악을 알게 하는 나무의 열매는 먹지 말라 네가 먹는 날에는 반드시 죽으리라 하시니라

sentences.original_text: But of the tree of the knowledge of good and evil
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 선과 악을 알게 하는 나무에서는

sentences.original_text: thou shalt not eat of it
for in the day that thou eatest thereof
